title: Bug 4971: Strange behavior when using 'copy package'
description:
Description: When using the 'copy package' feature in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 and selecting a destination, xx contains a package named 'ui' as a result. However, this behavior is unexpected and strange.

Observed Behavior: After using the 'copy package' feature and selecting xxx as the destination, xx contains a package named 'ui'.

Expected Behavior: After using the 'copy package' feature and selecting xxx as the destination, xx should not contain a package named 'ui'.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
2. Select the 'copy package' feature.
3. Choose xxx as the destination.
4. Verify that xx contains a package named 'ui'.
